scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run upload && npm run compile:cobol && npm run run:job
scripts.compile:cobol: sudo zowe jobs submit lf "./build/compiler.jcl" --directory "./output" --zosmf-p ztrial
scripts.run:job: sudo zowe jobs submit lf "./build/runjob.jcl" --directory "./output" --zosmf-p ztrial
scripts.start: npm run upload && npm run build
scripts.cobol:challenge_bkup: npm run compile:scripts && npm run parse && npm run allocate:input && npm run upload:data && npm run submit:job
scripts.cobol:challenge: npm run compile:scripts && npm run parse && npm run submit:job
